thread.title: YLighting, YLiving, and YBath Announce Fall Events, October 1-31
thread.title_full: YLighting, YLiving, and YBath Announce Fall Events, October 1-31 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: YLighting, YLiving, and YBath Announce Fall Events, October 1-31
text:
Save up to 20% on thousands of lighting, furniture, and bath designs.
Walnut Creek, CA (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
YLighting is pleased to announce its annual Fall Lighting Event , running October 1-31, with savings up to 20% on over 3,000 lighting designs from Artemide, FLOS Lighting, George Nelson Bubble Lamps, TECH Lighting and more. The event includes a range of product categories on sale, from pendant lights and track systems to floor and table lamps, and much more. The Fall Lighting Event also includes exclusive sales you won’t find anywhere else on several brands including Fabbian, Koncept Lighting, and Le Klint. There’s free shipping across all brands with many items in stock and ready to ship. YLighting’s team of highly knowledgeable sales consultants is available by phone, and ready to help with product recommendations, Quote: s, custom orders, and more.
YLiving will also be having its Fall Furniture Event in the month of October, featuring furniture and accessories from more than 40 leading brands including Kartell, Tom Dixon, and Vitra, also at savings of up to 20%. Visit YLiving.com to shop a range of modern sofas, dining room tables, chairs, bedroom furniture, and more. Recently refreshed search tools make it easier than ever to narrow searches based on brand, colors, dimensions, customer review ratings, shipping offers, and other criteria.
YBath’s Fall Bath Event features savings of up to 20% on a range of designs including modern faucets, sinks, vanities, showers, bathtubs, and bathroom accessories. The Event is comprised of leading European and American bath brands that are on sale exclusively at YBath.com. YBath is also launching Waterworks Studio in October, with Waterworks Studio Accessories part of the Fall Bath Event at a 20% savings.
During the month of October, all three websites – YLighting.com, YLiving.com, and YBath.com – are running a special giveaway where visitors can enter for a chance to win the Lzf Lamps Escape Pendant Light . A chain of self-supporting rectangle wood veneers defy gravity to create a ring of light. The Escape Pendant Light, by Irish designer Ray Power, evokes a circle of falling dominoes captured mid-flight. Stunning on its own over your dining room table or clustered together for an impressive focal point. Escape is a unique fixture sure to wow.
About YDesign Group
YDesign Group is an online-led retailer offering the best in modern and contemporary lighting, furnishings, and decorative plumbing to design driven consumers and trade professionals. Our extensive, yet carefully curated selection ranges from iconic mid-century designs to today’s most innovative products.
YLighting, our flagship brand that launched in 2001, is the leader in modern lighting sold online in the US. YLighting’s extensive selection of modern lamps, pendant lights, contemporary chandeliers, modern track lighting, table and floor lamps and ceiling fans represents the best modern designers and brands. The assortment features more than 10,000 designs from top international brands like Artemide, FLOS, Nelson Bubble Lamps, and Louis Poulsen. In 2008 we launched YLiving to provide our customers access to exceptional modern furniture and accessories. YLiving offers thousands of modern furnishings from such renowned brands as Herman Miller, Knoll, and Kartell, as well as from up-and-coming companies. In 2013, we expanded into the decorative plumbing category and in 2014, we launched YBath, our third store.
